amendment.description: An amendment numbered 54 printed in Part B of House Report 118-272 to direct $15 million to carry out section 2409 of Public Law 117-328 to allow states to build or maintain their own medical stockpile for their specific and unique needs, while coordinating with the strategic national stockpile.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Carter (GA) amendment (A021) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Carter (GA) amendment (A021) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Carter (GA) amendment (A021) Agreed to by voice vote.
